name: California Home for Seniors
overview:
California Home for Seniors offers FREE senior care assessment and FREE qualified placement referrals to the elderly and their families.

Our goal is to provide the families with one-on-one guidance during this difficult journey. Because we understand the selection for a loved one is a complex and personal choice, our experienced Eldercare Advisors help with informative decisions about all elder care options, with honesty and vast knowledge. Our caring staff will take into consideration the needs for your loved one so that they can enjoy loving care, peace of mind, and good quality of life.

With several years of experience in the health care industry California Home for Seniors is proudly affiliated with over 2000 qualified assisted livings, board & care, retirement and Alzheimer communities.

California Home for Seniors offers FREE senior care assessment and FREE qualified placement referrals to the elderly and their families. Our goal is to provide the families with one-on-one guidance during this difficult journey. Because we understand the selection for a loved one is a complex and personal choice, our experienced Eldercare Advisors help with informative decisions about all elder care options, with honesty and vast knowledge. Our caring staff will take into consideration the needs for your loved one so that they can enjoy loving care, peace of mind, and good quality of life.

California Home for Seniors team is available to help along the way and follow-up as the client navigates the senior living industry.

Our contract department handles updates on all current information as well as always be on the lookout for premier living locations to add to our roster. This personalized service is offered at no charge to our clients, as many of the nation’s care communities reimburse the company for its services.

California Home for Seniors was founded in 2006 by Igor and Arthur Mogilevski. With over several years of combined experience, both have developed thorough knowledge and understanding of Senior Housing Industry and the appendage to find proper placement resources. The key is to find a more personal and passionate way combined with total professionalism in searching for a proper placement to cater to each specific clientâ€™s needs. The companyâ€™s founding principal is to solely focus on the families and their loved onesâ€™ requirements in order to find the perfect home.
